thread.title: Kylie Jenner debuts sleek brunette bob after taking out hair extensions
thread.title_full: Kylie Jenner debuts sleek brunette bob after taking out hair extensions

author: Lara Martin
title: Kylie Jenner debuts sleek brunette bob after taking out hair extensions
text:
Kylie Jenner debuts sleek brunette bob after taking out hair extensions The teenager has changed her hairstyle yet again - and fans love it! Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Kylie Jenner showcases her NEW HAIR on Snapchat Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
She’s experimented with multiple eye catching hair colours and lengths over the years, but Kylie Jenner ’s latest ‘do is all about back to basics. 
The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star, 19, debuted a sleek and natural bob on social media overnight, after getting rid of her lengthy blonde hair extensions. 
Kylie showed off her new hair in a Snapchat video, posing up a storm in the passenger seat while boyfriend Tyga drove. Kylie's ditched the hair extensions for a bob (Photo: SNAPCHAT) Kylie made sure to show off her new locks from all angles (Photo: SNAPCHAT) 
When one fan asked if that was Kylie’s real hair, she replied: “Yes it is.” 
Her devoted fans were quick to praise the new do, with a slew of comments pouring in calling Kylie’s latest look “so pretty”, “lovely” and “fresh.” 
One admirer said: “You are so beautiful with every single hair colour and cut.” Kylie previously had long blonde hair (Photo: SNAPCHAT) Fans praised Kylie's natural 'do (Photo: SNAPCHAT) 
And Kylie’s had a LOT of hair colours and cuts over the years! 
She’s been platinum blonde, green, pink, grey, blue and peach, as well as her natural dark locks. She’s also switched between super long hair extensions and shoulder-grazing styles. 
Kylie told Interview magazine last year that dying her hair blue and chopping it off three years ago had been the start of her love for experimenting with her image. 
"Honestly, what I think set everything off is when I cut my hair off when I was 16 and dyed it blue. After that, I just felt so free and wanted to experiment with my look," she said. 
"I thought I knew who I was and what I wanted to look like, but then once I did that, I was like, "Whoa, there's a world of difference." I just felt like I could be whoever I wanted to be, and I'm all about, like, experimenting. 
"I'm still so young, so I'm just having fun." She's been blonde in the past (Photo: Snapchat) Kylie's had many styles over the years (Photo: Splash) 
Her latest bob is all back to basics for Kylie, as she told Vogue last year that shoulder length hair is her natural look. 
"My natural hair is a choppy bob, so I would probably have to say that's how I prefer it," she said. "But I love extensions and having fun with my hair. Like us on Facebook
